author: dlr
msg: (ramdisk-tests): Include command-line to mount a RAM disk on the fly
(provided by maxb).  Simplify the /etc/fstab entry, and reduce the
suggested RAM disk size to 32 MB (maxb indicates that with
CLEANUP=true we peak at around 3 MB).
